fullDescription.intro:
This node can be used to load git log directly from git repository (online version).
To use this plugin You should only give Git's repository address (local) in configuration windows or You can give remote repository address and local path to clone repository. You can clone repository directly from node's configuration window. If You want to see in KNIME console progress of cloning repository than You should change log level in Your KNIME settings to INFO. You can do it in menu: "Window -> Preferences -> KNIME -> KNIME GUI".
This node analyzes information about every class in every commit from the given git's log file or git repository and returns a table with the following data:
name of class
marker
author of change
action
complete message from commit
original path of class
date of change
Unique ID of record
Action could consists of following values:
M - modification
A - added
C - copied
D - deleted
R - renamed
T - file type changed (i.e. regular file to symlink)
fullDescription.option: Address of remote GIT's repository which You want to clone and analyze

Address of Git's repository which should be analyzed. It should be local path and if it will be empty than clonning will be exactly into this path or if it will be not empty than clonning will be into path get from repository's url. If You want to clone remote repo it will be cloned into this path.
You can get list of branches into analyzed repository with button "Get branches" and select branch which You want to analyze

ports.outPort: Table with data read from Git log file or Git repository
